name: RedHat Cluster Agents
body:
## PostgreSQL resource agents

Full PostgreSQL support, including replication and transaction logs shipping. Maximal splitbrain protection.

For usage see examples in `config/` directory.

### PostgreSQL service agent (postgres)
Controls PostgreSQL service state and parameters.

### PostgreSQL Master resource agent (postgres_masterslave)
Controls PostgreSQL master role over cluster.

### PostgreSQL WAL receiver agent (pg_receivexlog)
Controls WAL receiver process with all its parameters. In fact, it's just an init-script replacement.
